item.title: Analysing poll trends
item.description:
This site is very much still under development, but I’ve also been working on a little project to chart trends in opinion polls for the UK May 2015 elections alongside party political news stories.

There’s a few front end issues to sort out but you can check out the progress at http://polls.impey.io

In the upcoming weeks I’ll be polishing this off (hopefully before the date of the election!) and finishing this site.
